organisation_name: Sunshine Kaidi (Finland) New Energy Co. Oy (Kaidi Finland)
section: II - In-house lobbyists and trade/business/professional associations
membership:
Kaidi is a member of AEBIOM, European Biomass Association: www.aebiom.org 
 
and LSB, Leaders of Sustainable Biofuels: sustainablebiofuelsleaders.com/wordpress/
relevant_communication: Further information about Kaidi's activities available at www.kaidi.fi
goals__remit: Kaidi’s goal is to enable world-class bioenergy production in Finland. The company plans to build a biodiesel refinery in Kemi, northern Finland that will produce 2nd generation advanced biofuels, biodiesel and biogasoline. Sunshine Kaidi New Energy Group, one of China’s largest biorefining actors and the owner of Kaidi Finland, began the preparation of the Kemi biorefinery project in 2014. Kaidi Finland and its headquarters are located in Helsinki, Finland.
